title: Club Med logo typeface
content:
Hello,

Does anybody id the font used in the Club Med logo?

Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121300im_/http:/typophile.com/files/club-med_neige_5361.jpg)
author: Marcedo

comments.content:
Hi, I'd been wondering about this one as well (it's a bit like CG Heldustry), the logo is apparently done by french design company Desgrippes Gob√©, but doesn't say on their site if it is a whole proper typeface or not:

[http://www.dga.com/portfolio/case-studies/new-identity-and-new-positioni...](http://web.archive.org/web/20120111121300/http:/www.dga.com/portfolio/case-studies/new-identity-and-new-positioning-for-club-med.html "http://www.dga.com/portfolio/case-studies/new-identity-and-new-positioning-for-club-med.html")
